resources.string: The fields for the name and password need to be filled

The idea of ​​making this application arises from the need to find vegan restaurants in the different places where I travel, because I always used google maps and I would have liked an App to exist in which, in addition to knowing the vegan and vegetarian restaurants that were nearby, You could also see news about the vegan world and recipes.

The first cookbook to use the new word vegan in its title was by Fay K. Henderson, published in 1946..
A diet without animal products is extremely versatile. The transition to a more plant-based diet opens up a world of new and exciting culinary possibilities. Animal products can be easily substituted...

Fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbage, pumpkin, garlic, olives, broccoli, apples, nectarines, berries, bananas, melons and oranges are foods that are an important source of vitamins, minerals, phytonutrients and fiber.. 

Legumes such as lentils, peas, beans, soybeans and lupins are an important source of protein..

Whole grains and cereals such as oats, rye, spelled, wheat, barley, millet, and rice, along with pseudocereals such as quinoa, amaranth, and buckwheat, provide complex carbohydrates, fiber, and phytochemicals..

Nuts and seeds such as flaxseeds, walnuts and hemp seeds provide healthy fats and nutrients with high nutritional value..

Vegan meat alternatives like tofu, vegan burgers, schnitzel and sausage can be found in many versions made with, for example, soy, seitan and lupine. There are also vegan alternatives for milk, yogurt and cheese. These are usually made with soybeans, nuts and cereals.
